All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Advance
Represents a specific command following the Command pattern.
AggressivePlayer
Defines an Aggressive Player strategy.
Airlift
This class handles the execution and validation of Airlift Validate.
AppConstants
This class defines a set of constants used throughout the application.
BenevolentPlayer
This denotes the category of a Benevolent Player who prioritizes the defense of their own nations and refrains from initiating any attacks.
Blockade
Execution of the Blockade order involves converting one of your territories into a neutral one while tripling the number of armies on that territory.
Bomb
Using the bomb card results in a 50% reduction in the army units of the target country.
Card
This model class oversees the player's card ownership and management.
CheaterPlayer
The `CheaterPlayer` class represents a player with a cheating strategy in a game.
Command
Command class to handle command line instructions.
CommonCode
Common utility class to check null/empty collections, string, and object.
ConquestMap
Handles read, write operatons on ConquestMap.
Continent
This model class manages all the Continents in the map.
Country
This model class manages all the countries on the map.
CustomObservable
Custom subject (observable) class responsible for managing observers.
CustomObserver
Custom observer interface.
Deploy
Concrete Command of Command pattern.
Diplomacy
Represents a Diplomacy card used in a game.
DominationMap
This class is responsible to read map in domination format.
ExceptionLogHandler
Class to Add Exception to Logs that are not caught using try/catch.
GameEngineCtx
This is the entry point of the Game and keeps the track of current Game State.
GamePlayPhase
This abstract class lists the methods required for all game phases.
GameService
The GameService class load and save game file.
GameState
This class is used to test functionality of GameState class functions.
HumanPlayer
The `HumanPlayer` class represents a player with human behavior in a game.
InvalidCommand
Command Exceptions are thrown by this class.
InvalidMap
Defined Map Exceptions are thrown by this class.
IssueOrderPhase
Implementation of the Issue Order Phase for GamePlay using the State Pattern.
LogEntryBuffer
Records and manages logs for different stages within the game.
Logger
The Logger class manages the update of a log file based on notifications received from the LogEntryBuffer.
Map
this model class manages all the maps.
MapAdapter
Map Adapter implementation to handle different formats of map.
MapService
The MapService class load, read, parse, edit, and save map file.
Order
The Command pattern's implementation: This model class is responsible for handling and overseeing the orders issued by players.
OrderExecutionPhase
Implementation of the Order Execution Phase for GamePlay using the State Pattern.
Player
This model class manages all the players in the game.
PlayerBehaviorStrategy
This is Player Behavior's abstract strategy class.
PlayerService
This class is responsible for handling player operations.
RandomPlayer
This describes the Random Player class, which randomly deploys armies, attacks neighboring countries at random, and moves armies within their own territories randomly.
ShowMap
This is class to display Map.
StartUpPhase
Implementation of the concrete state Start-Up Phase for GamePlay.
Tournament
Class implementaion of tournament mode.
TournamentView
Tournament view class Implementation.
